sourcesContent:
export const TYPE_KEY = 'type'
export const PERIOD_KEY = 'period'
export const RANGE_KEY = 'range'
export const MONTH_KEY = 'month'
export const YEAR_KEY = 'year'

export const LAST_PERIOD_KEY = 'last_period'
export const LAST_YEAR_KEY = 'last_year'

export const PERIODS = [
  { id: 'month', label: 'Mensual', months: 1 },
  { id: 'trimester', label: 'Trimestral', months: 3 },
  { id: 'semester', label: 'Semestral', months: 6 },
  { id: 'year', label: 'Anual', months: 12 }
]

export const PERIOD_LABELS = {
  trimester: 'Trimestre',
  semester: 'Semestre',
  year: 'A単o',
  thirteen: '13 meses anteriores'
}

export const RANGE = [
  { id: LAST_PERIOD_KEY, label: 'Periodo inmediato anterior' },
  { id: LAST_YEAR_KEY, label: 'Mismo periodo a単o anterior' }
]

export const TYPES = [
  { id: 'income', label: 'Ingresos' },
  { id: 'expense', label: 'Gastos' }
]

export const TYPES_LABELS = {
  incomes: 'Ingreso',
  expenses: 'Gasto'
}

export const COLORS = [
  '#E70094', // chart-pink-2
  '#FFB63F', // chart-yellow-2
  '#00BCB4', // chart-turquoise-2
  '#4184F5', // chart-blue-2
  '#A8A8A8', // chart-gray-2
  '#B00A85', // chart-pink-3
  '#D98905', // chart-yellow-3
  '#068984', // chart-turquoise-3
  '#1A57BE', // chart-blue-3
  '#6A6A6A', // chart-gray-3
  '#E5C8E6', // chart-pink-1
  '#FFE3B4', // chart-yellow-1
  '#8AE1DE', // chart-turquoise-1
  '#A2C5FD', // chart-blue-1
  '#D6D6D6', // chart-gray-1
  '#821466', // chart-pink-4
  '#AE6C00', // chart-yellow-4
  '#00615D', // chart-turquoise-4
  '#003388', // chart-blue-4
  '#3F3F3F' // chart-gray-4
]

export const LABEL_KEY = 'label'
export const AMOUNT_KEY = 'amount'
export const PERCENTAGE_KEY = 'percentage'
export const PERIOD_START_KEY = 'start_month'
export const PERIOD_END_KEY = 'end_month'
export const PERCENTAGE_THRESHOLD_AMOUNT = 5
export const SMALL_ITEMS_SUMARIZED_LABEL = 'Otros'
